questions.question: Which of the following allows you to set coverage targets and receive alerts when your utilization drops below the threshold you define?
Which of the following is the most cost-effective AWS Support Plan to use if you need access to AWS Support API for programmatic case management?

A customer currently has a Basic support plan and they are planning to use the Infrastructure Event Management, Well-Architected Reviews and Operations Reviews features in AWS. What should they do in order to access these features in the most cost-effective manner?

options.A: None since these features are already included in their Basic support plan.

questions.question: Which of the following actions will incur AWS charges? (Select TWO.)

options.A: Network charges for the transfer of data from your data center to S3 through a VPN
options.B: Provisioning elastic IPs and attaching them to running EC2 instances
options.C: Transfer of EC2 files between two AWS Regions
options.D: Setting up additional VPCs in your account
options.E: Using AWS CloudFormation to create resources

questions.question: Which of the following provides you access to Reserved Instance (RI) purchase recommendations based on your past usage and indicate potential opportunities for savings as compared to On-Demand usage?
Among the following payment options, which of the following can be chosen when purchasing a Standard or Convertible Reserved Instance? (Select THREE.)
A customer is choosing the best AWS support plan which includes a designated Technical Account Manager. Which of the following should they choose?
Which of the following does the Enterprise support plan provide to customers in AWS? (Select TWO.)

options.A: Limited access to the 7 Core Trusted Advisor checks
options.B: 15-minute response time support if your production system goes down
options.E: 5-minute response time support if your business-critical system goes down

questions.question: Which of the following is true regarding the AWS Cost and Usage report? (Select TWO.)

options.A: Provides you with granular data about your AWS costs and usage
options.B: Lets you set custom cost and usage budgets that alert you when those thresholds are exceeded
options.C: Helps you visualize, understand, and manage your AWS costs and usage over time via an intuitive interface that enables you to quickly create custom reports
options.D: Provides you a dashboard that lets you view the status of your month-to-date AWS expenditure and provides access to a number of other cost management products that can help you dig deeper into your AWS costs and usage
options.E: Allows you to load your cost and usage information into Amazon Athena, Amazon Redshift, and AWS QuickSight

questions.question: You have an Amazon Linux EC2 instance running for an hour and thirty minutes. How will AWS bill you in terms of usage?

options.A: You will only be billed for an hour according to the hourly billing rule
options.B: You will be billed for one hour and thirty minutes according to the hourly billing rule
options.C: You will be billed for an hour and thirty minutes according to the per-second billing rule
options.D: You will be billed for an hour and twenty-nine minutes according to the per second billing rule

questions.question: A company plans to launch an Amazon EC2 instance with an attached AmazonEBSvolume in the default configuration. Billing is incurred only for theEBSstorage when the instance is in a specific state. Which instance state is it?
Which feature will customers have access to by using the AWS Business Support plan?
Which of the following support plans provides access to the AWS Personal Health Dashboard?
A company is using Cost Explorer to gain an understanding of its cost trends in AWS. How many months of historical data can Cost Explorer store and display?

A company needs access to the full set of monitoring checks in AWS Trusted Advisor to ensure that its cloud environment is well-architected. What is the MOST cost-effective support plan that the company should avail of?

A company plans to migrate its existing on-premises infrastructure to the AWS Cloud. The current business workflows heavily rely on legacy systems. The company aims to evaluate AWS Cloud readiness first and prioritize business transformation opportunities before starting migration activities. Which AWS service or tool can help achieve these requirements?
The use of multi-threading in Amazon S3 requests via the Multipart Upload API is an example of which AWS cloud best practice?
Which statement below is correct regarding the components of the AWS Global Infrastructure?

options.A: An Availability Zone contains multiple AWS Regions.
options.B: An AWS Region contains multiple Availability Zones.
options.C: An Availability Zone contains edge locations.
options.D: An edge location contains multiple AWS Regions.

questions.question: A customer is planning to migrate some of their web applications that are hosted on-premises to AWS. Which of the following is a benefit of using AWS over virtualized data centers?

options.A: Higher variable costs and higher upfront costs.
options.B: Higher variable costs and lower upfront costs.
options.C: Lower variable costs and higher upfront costs.
options.D: Lower variable costs and lower upfront costs.

questions.question: Which AWS service is suitable for launching a highly scalable MySQL OLTP database?
Which AWS Billing and Cost Management tool allows the forecasting of future costs and usage of AWS resources based on past consumption?
Which service would you use to speed up content delivery to your customers?

A startup wants to move its on-premises infrastructure to AWS. The IT Security team wants to protect all of the applications against unintended and unauthorized access as well as potential vulnerabilities. Which of the following capability of AWS CAF's Security perspective would be most relevant to address this concern?

An organization would like to boost productivity by improving business communication channels and customer service experience. Which of the following AWS applications would be suggested? (Select TWO.)
What is the minimum support plan that will provide you access to all Trusted Advisor Checks?
What is the right arrangement of the AWS Global Infrastructure components according to their geographical coverage area size, in descending order?
Auto-Scaling based on demand is an implementation of which AWS cloud best practice?
Which of the following advantages of cloud computingdescribes the continual price reduction of AWS services?

options.B: Benefit from massive economies of scale
options.C: Stop spending money running and maintaining data centers
options.D: Trade capital expense for variable expense

questions.question: Agility is one of the benefits of using cloud computing that provides customer with what advantage?

options.A: Avoid overprovisioning of your infrastructure to ensure you have enough capacity to handle your business operations at the peak level of activity.
options.B: Allows you to trade capital expense for variable expense.
options.C: Easily deploy your application in multiple physical locations around the world with just a few clicks.
options.D: Focus your valuable IT resources on developing applications that differentiate your business rather than managing infrastructure and data centers.

questions.question: A company plans to migrate on-premises VMs to AWS. To coordinate the large-scale migration, they must find a way to automate, schedule, and track the entire procedure. Which of the following services should they use?

options.A: Use AWS Application Migration Service to migrate on-premises workloads to AWS.
options.B: Use AWS Migration Hub to track the progress of migrations.
options.C: Use AWS Database Migration Service to migrate on-premises workloads to AWS.
options.D: Use Amazon CloudWatch to monitor the migration process.

questions.question: A company plans to migrate its operations to AWS and wants to justify the value of the cloud migration. The company seeks to define its measurable business outcomes by identifying and prioritizing transformation opportunities using the AWS Cloud Adoption Framework (AWS CAF). Which phase of the cloud transformation journey do these plans belong to?
Which of the following characteristics correctly describes the Amazon Simple Storage Service? (Select TWO.)

options.A: A durable, high throughput file system
options.B: A storage service with virtually unlimited space
options.C: A highly durable object storage infrastructure

questions.question: Which of the following is a key use case of AWS Control Tower?

options.A: A way for customers to send instructions to an AWS account on how to deploy popular technologies such as WordPress.
options.B: An easy way to establish a landing zone that implements an AWS well-architected, multi-account environment and applies the AWS best practices.
options.C: A centralized logging service for all types of log files.
options.D: A fast monitoring engine used to detect if any of your AWS accounts deviate from the AWS best practices.

questions.question: Which of the following can a developer use to interact with your AWS services? (Select TWO.)
Which of the following is not required when launching an EBS-backed EC2 instance?
Which AWS service is commonly used for streaming data in real-time?

A customer in North Virginia, USA, is doing some drone work and collecting environmental data. Which of the following options allows easy access to terabytes of data storage for use in a space-constrained environment and allows data transfer to AWS?
Which of the following options allows customers to find, buy, and immediately start using the software and services that run on AWS?

Which of these is AWS’s digital user engagement service that enables customers to effectively communicate with end users and measure engagement across multiple channels, including email, text messaging (SMS), and mobile push notifications?

A company is using Amazon S3 to store various types of documents in a single bucket, and different teams frequently access the stored objects. If the document is accidentally overwritten or deleted, the data must be recoverable. Which of the following S3 features should they use?
Which of the following is a serverless compute service of AWS?
A company has multiple AWS accounts. How can they take advantage of this to save on their monthly costs?

options.A: Create an IAM Group containing all the AWS accounts and enable consolidated billing
options.B: Migrate all resources to a central account to take advantage of volume discounts
options.C: Use AWS Organizations and enable consolidated billing
options.D: Set a budget for each account to minimize spending

questions.question: Which cloud computing advantage describes how you can easily deploy your application in multiple AWS regions with just a few clicks?

options.A: Benefit from massive economies of scale
options.C: Stop spending money running and maintaining data centers

questions.question: Which of the following are the capabilities provided by Amazon Route 53? (Select TWO.)
A developer needs to collect and process large streams of data records in real-time. Which AWS service should be used for this task?
A customer plans to speed up the time it takes to download data between its clients and an Amazon S3 bucket over long distances. Which of the following options would meet this requirement?

A company wants to shift its operations to the AWS Cloud. The company is using the various AWS Cloud Adoption Framework (AWS CAF) perspectives to expand pilot initiatives and business value to the desired scale. Which specific phase of the cloud transformation journey does this align with?
Which of the following is a benefit of using AWS Global Accelerator?

options.A: Decreased latency in accessing applications hosted in AWS
options.B: Accelerates server performance of your Amazon EC2 instances globally
options.C: Reduced server costs in running AWS Services
options.D: Provides a highly durable data store in AWS

questions.question: Which of the following Amazon RDS features should you use to achieve high availability with automatic failover?

An e-commerce company is in the process of modernizing its infrastructure and migrating its operations to the cloud. The Chief Technology Officer (CTO) has chosen Amazon Web Services (AWS) as the cloud service provider and plans to follow the AWS Cloud Adoption Framework (CAF) methodology to guide this transformation. Which perspective of the AWS CAF would be most beneficial for ensuring a successful migration and transformation in this scenario?

A customer plans to use Amazon S3 to store their less frequently accessed data and reduce their costs. The data is re-creatable and will be used as a secondary backup.They also require S3’s low latency and high throughput performance.Which of the following storage classes is the cheapest and most suitable option?
Which of the following AWS services can be used to turn text into a lifelike speech, allowing you to create applications that talk and run speech-enabled products?
A customer wants to send push notifications to her mobile users whenever a new patch comes out. What service is the most appropriate for this task?
Which of the following AWS service can help you automate and simplify the process of transferring data between on-premises storage systems and AWS storage services?
If you are tasked to create a lightweight Wordpress site in AWS without having to install the package on your own, which PaaS solution in AWS will allow you to do this easily?
Which of the following should be set up in order to connect the Amazon VPC network to the local network via an IPsec tunnel?

options.A: VPC Peering connection between your on-premises network and VPC
options.B: A NAT gateway in your private subnet connected to your on-premises network
options.C: An on-premises NAT gateway device connected to your VPC's Internet Gateway
options.D: A VPN gateway in your VPC connected to the Customer Gateway in your on-premises network

questions.question: What are the things that you can implement to improve the security of your Identity and Access Management (IAM) users? (Select TWO.)

options.A: Block incoming traffic via Network ACL.
options.C: Block incoming traffic via Security Groups.
options.E: Configure a strong password policy for your users.

questions.question: Which of the following AWS service provides managed compliance and security controls for workloads?
Which of the following is typically used to secure Amazon VPC subnets?
What is the most secure way to provide applications temporary access to your AWS resources?

options.A: Create an IAM user with access keys and assign it to the application
options.B: Create an IAM group that has access to the resources, and add the application there
options.C: Create an IAM role and have the application assume the role
options.D: Create an IAM policy that allows the application to access the resources, and attach the policy to the application

questions.question: Which of the following policies grant the necessary permissions required to access Amazon S3 resources? (Select TWO.)
Which of the following is part of the best practices in securing your AWS account?

options.A: Enable MFA only on the root account
options.C: Always manually define permissions to each and every individual IAM user
options.D: Create an IAM user with admin privileges instead of using root

questions.question: A company plans to encrypt and manage its own encryption keys using a single-tenant hardware security module. The company must also have exclusive control over how its keys are used via an authentication mechanism independent from AWS. Which service would meet that requirement?
Which of the following security features can be enabled in Amazon Workspaces to ensure compliance with regulations and protect sensitive data?

options.A: Allowing employees to use their personal devices for work.
options.B: Storing sensitive data in an unencrypted form in the workspace.
options.C: Enabling multi-factor authentication for user access to workspaces.
options.D: Disabling firewalls and antivirus software in the workspace for better performance.

questions.question: Which of the following is a benefit of using Amazon Cognito for user authentication and authorization in a web application?

options.A: Amazon Cognito can only authenticate users who have Amazon accounts.
options.B: Amazon Cognito provides a built-in user interface for login and registration.
options.C: Amazon Cognito requires developers to manage user pools and identity providers.
options.D: Amazon Cognito is only suitable for small-scale applications with limited users.
